Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory974.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront21.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=50>Warm sunlight streams through the window.</size>', 3: '510', 4: '50', 6: '1', 7: '1', 8: '0.5', 9: '3'}
{3: 'I was talking with Wanshi late last night and ended up crashing here. Is it already morning...'}
{3: "This weather's perfect for sleeping in..."}
{3: 'Thinking this, you turn a bit, only to feel a sudden weight pressing against your forehead...'}
{2: "Don't press on my head... it's too heavy...", 3: '17'}
{3: 'Wanshi moves the cat that wandered in, finally taking the weight off.'}
{3: 'A fresh smell wakes you up, you rouse from your light slumber and rub your eyes, turning to see the white-haired Construct beside you.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Feeling more awake now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He puts the source of the smell—Kowloong-style tea—on the table.'}
{2: "You're back?!", 3: '29', 4: 'Did you just put something on my head?', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Yep. If you hadn't woken up, I was going to put something even heavier on you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi sits next to you and starts arranging bottles and containers.'}
{2: 'Mint syrup, sparkling water, osmanthus petals...', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Can you really make those drinks you talked about with just these ingredients?', 3: '37'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'This should be enough.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After getting everything ready, Wanshi puts three small bottles aside.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Here's the wishing bottle I promised.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just three, huh.', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Could we do thirty wishes instead? Or even fifty...', 3: '44'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Greedy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Like we said, three wishes, three cups of "Wanshi\'s Special Mix" for you today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Now, you make a wish. It's your big day, you get whatever you want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Go ahead, write it down. I promised I wouldn't look.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Since you say so—', 3: '52'}
{3: 'You grab a piece of paper from the wishing bottle and write your first wish.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Can I open it now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With your permission, Wanshi takes his first wishing bottle for today.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '"My first wish is a cup of \'Birthday Wishes from Wanshi\'."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You're pretty direct.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He scans the bottles and jars on the table and selects a few after a moment's thought. Pouring and mixing with practiced movements, he completes the first special drink."}
{2: 'You made that that fast?', 3: '64'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "If I've planned it all, it doesn't take long to do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "As for the taste—you'll have to try it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You take the drink, look at it, then sip. It's layered—the upper half a delicate green like rain-washed grass, the lower half a sea-blue hue reminiscent of ocean waters."}
{2: 'Mmm, the green part on top is really refreshing.', 3: '71'}
{2: 'It smells like flowers and tastes a bit sharp. This is...', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It's jasmine tea and green plum syrup.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Green plum wine helps with tiredness. And the jasmine—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'In Kowloong, we say, "Together in peace, never to part." It essentially means staying safely by each other\'s side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'That blue stuff at the bottom—I think I know that. Is it a butterfly pea flower?', 3: '78'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Lots of drinks use butterfly pea flowers because they change color magically.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'It makes you think of lots of things: the sky, the ocean, things that spark the imagination.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So, what's the meaning this time?", 3: '83'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Freedom.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm just giving you the base. How you define your own wishes upon that foundation is entirely up to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Besides safety, I hope you reach your goals. Like a bird flying or a fish swimming, that's freedom.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A clean, sweet smell fills your mouth—the taste lingers.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Happy with your first wish?', 4: '1'}
{2: "This is just the first one and it's already so good. You sure you'll have ideas for the other two?", 3: '93'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Then we'll see.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He smiles a little—he's not worried at all."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "There's so much I want to say with these drinks... Maybe too much for one day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "We've got plenty of time—let's enjoy it.", 4: '1'}
